vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.11.26; married to Nebat (H5028);
mother of: Jeroboam (H3379)
§ Zeruah = "full breasted"
wife of Nebat and mother of king Jeroboam I of the northern kingdom of Israel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: madre del rey Jeroboam I de Israel
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗魯阿 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "豐胸的"
尼八的妻子, 北國以色列王耶羅波安一世的母親 (王上 11:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗鲁阿 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "丰胸的"
尼八的妻子, 北国以色列王耶罗波安一世的母亲 (王上 11:26)
